DOC.brief_summary: This trial examines the analgesia of the fibula free flap donor site by peri-neuronal catheter in oro-pharyngeal carcinoma surgery by comparing continuous infusion of a local anesthetic with systemic multimodal analgesia.
DOC.brief_title: Analgesia of Fibula Free Flap Donor Site by Peri-Neuronal Catheter in Oro-Pharyngeal Carcinoma Surgery
DOC.criteria: Adult patients scheduled for oropharyngeal carcinoma surgery with reconstruction by fibula free flap Allergy to propofol or local anesthetic (ropivacaine) Severe renal or cardiac failure
